code: import React from'react';import'../styles/skills.css';import SkillsAvatar from'../assets/img/avatar/ar-skills-avatar.png';import ProgressBar from"./ProgressBar";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var skillsProgress=[{item:'ReactJS',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:30},{item:'Vue.JS',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:30},{item:'JavaScript',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:40},{item:'CSS',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:70},{item:'HTML',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:70},{item:'UI Design',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:70},{item:'Adobe Illustrator',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:60},{item:'Figma',bgcolor:"#FEC3C3",completed:80}];function Skills(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SkillsAvatar,alt:"Andrea Recuyo Skills Avatar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-progress",children:skillsProgress.map(function(item,idx){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgressBar,{item:item.item,bgcolor:item.bgcolor,completed:item.completed},idx);})})]})]})});}export default Skills;
